# TabletopInteraction.DeadZone

**Enumeration**

The dead zone allows to specify how much the input device should move or rotate from its initial pose to start moving the object.

## Declaration

```swift
enum DeadZone
```

## Interaction zones

- **TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.default**: The default dead zone values.
- **TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.disabled**: Use this value to disable the dead zone.
- **TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.within(distance:angle:)**: Allows to customize the dead zone values. The object will start moving when the first of these two thresholds is reached.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
